extendedInfo.description: EMPLOYEESPoint your mobile browser to https://mobile.adp.com for employee self service using ADP Mobile Solutions.OWNERS AND PAYROLL ADMINISTRATORSThe RUN Powered by ADPÂ® Mobile Payroll app is a new convenient way to help you manage your payroll anytime, anywhere on your Androidâ¢ device. It is a fast, intuitive, and secure mobile version of RUN Powered by ADP -- the industry-leading full-service online payroll solution that PC Magazine called âexceedingly simple to understand and use.â* Available for current RUN Powered by ADP clients**, you can pay hourly and salaried employees as well as contractors while you are on the go. Use our patent-pending, easy to use interface to quickly enter and review pay data for processing your payrolls. Manage your employees more effectively using the HR Checkup and HR Dictionary.KEY FEATURES:- Pay employees and contractors using pre-defined pay rates- Pay different pay rates to employees who perform more than one job- Distribute pay to different departments- Calculate employee earnings and deductions- Preview payroll totals and cash requirements- Calculate federal, state, and local taxes- Change check dates- Enter vacation, sick and personal time- View employee contact, photo, and payroll information- View reports for employee and company payroll information ADDITIONAL HR FEATURES:- Assess how your HR practices stack up to best practices by topic with an HR Checkup- Access a dictionary with over 600 HR and payroll terms and definitions- View weekly HR TipsSECURITY:- Private information is not stored on the device- Account number information is never transmitted- All transactions are routed through ADP's secure servers- Login sessions time out from inactivity- Account is locked out with excessive login failures REQUIREMENTS:- Android OS version 2.1 or later- WiFi or 3G Internet connection - User ID and password is required to access the payroll functions (RUN Powered by ADP US clients only)- No User ID is required to use the HR Checkup and HR DictionaryLEARN MORE:Are you a RUN Powered by ADP client? Download the app and try the demo. Or contact your ADP customer service center.Â© 2012 ADP, Inc. ADP and the ADP Logo are registered trademarks of ADP, Inc. RUN Powered by ADP is a registered service mark of ADP, Inc. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. All other trademarks and services marks are the property of their respective owners.**Not an ADP client? Visit smallbusiness.adp.com or Call 1-800-CALL-ADP*Source: PC Magazine, June 2007

reviews.title: Needs improvement!!!
reviews.comment: Disappointing!! Couldn\'t view copies of pay stubs on the website so downloaded the app. Can\'t view on app either. Have to figure out if my hrs are correct bc they are added all together. Please correct!!
reviews.author: Patrick Mulligan

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice app but I wish there was a option to see the gross pay. That is the only reason I didn\'t give this app 5 stars otherwise it would be the perfect app
reviews.author: Chris Aldrich

reviews.title: Poorly done
reviews.comment: Can\'t view my paystub specifics. Can\'t even use the feedback page. Worthless app. And the website won\'t let me view the pdf. Gotta use a computer. This was done on a Galaxy 2 tab and Galaxy 3 phone. Neither work.
reviews.author: John Wolfenbarger

reviews.title: Works On Galaxy Tablet 10.1
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the app this evening and was able to view my pay studs with no problem. Thank you!
reviews.author: John Wray

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Really good app  I dont have to use the computer anymore.
reviews.author: Rey Onofre

reviews.title: Only a weblink...
reviews.comment: For employees. I guess it\'s good for admins.
reviews.author: Melchior Perias

reviews.title: Worked great could see all my money and taxes what I
reviews.comment: Needed to view my check on my tablet
reviews.author: Nicholas Newland

reviews.title: Vacation
reviews.comment: I thought with the update I could view my vacation. .wrong. .before it said I had 2 hours when I had 40 now it says I have -38. What\'s wrong with this program..
reviews.author: Heather Freeman

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Can\'t even log in. I have to reinstall app everytime I want to log in. I\'ll go to the adp mobile and my login works perfect. Probably won\'t keep it if it\'s not fixed soon.
reviews.author: Marianne Sharp

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: View check stub a day before.  And see time available for vacation
reviews.author: Miesha Gibbs-Clark

reviews.comment: Wont allow me to even log in anymore. Great app first 6 months but useless now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing..
reviews.comment: Used to work...now I can\'t get it to open....
reviews.author: Brandi Molnar

reviews.title: Login Fail
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy S4 - login continues to fail though the id & password are correct. Uninstalling... please fix this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good idea.
reviews.author: mauricio gonzalez

reviews.title: J
reviews.comment: J
reviews.author: Ariana Cruz

reviews.title: Cool Idea
reviews.comment: I understand the idea of the app.  But all it is for employees is a glorified hyperlink.  Even so the pay stubs them selves cannot be viewed.  I already know how much I Was payed. Waste of time to download.
reviews.author: Casandra Rennow

reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
reviews.comment: This app works great. Very handy when away from your computer. Recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I hate this site
reviews.comment: I\'d rather my things be mailed! The fact that some people can log in, but even more can\'t such as myself! Ugghhh what a waist of time!
reviews.author: Shalana Cartwright

reviews.title: Not worth the space
reviews.comment: This is not worth the space it takes up on my phone. It only displays the deposited amount for a given pay date. It does not anything else! I need to check to make sure my times were recorded under the correct categories so have to log in with my desktop anyway.
reviews.author: Kim Campanella

reviews.title: Works as Expected -  Satisfied.
reviews.comment: This app is super simple with no bells and whistles. It allows me to see my benefits, pay and retirement amounts. I wouldn\'t want it to do too much more for  security reasons. I\'m satisfied with the app and send a thank you to its developers.
reviews.author: Meghan Hutchins
